long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Tracker Chrome Extension is a handy bookmark extension that will bookmark the tabs that you want to remember and be able to look at another day without having to search the Internet to find it. 

Using this extension you can add the tab of your choice to the extension which will help you keep fewer tabs open.
